Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Chemlab^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Chemistry is a ^orange;extremely important^reset; science that will allow you to combine chemicals to create all sorts of useful solutions. Fertilizer, liquids, explosive components and particles are all potential creations. Start by building an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; before doing anything too complex, though. It is a difficult science with many dangerous substances unsafe for the un-schooled.
Nicely done. Now you'll need to find some space for this in your own base.
